channel.title: SLUGBLASTER: One shot for Gauntlet Camp Pursuivant
channel.description:
Hello all. Practicing my posting skills for the Gauntlet Camp Pursuivant event. :D
"Hey...hey kid...you wanna break the laws of time and space?"
You play a young person using barely legal technology to travel across dimensions. You and your crew can hop over to the post-apocolyptic mall, scavenge the ruined mecha of a lost civilization or try to escape the fire breathing dragon the lives in a wasteland volcano. Just be sure to make it home in time for curfew, or you could loose more than your hoverboard.
One shot session: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MLP3me9EeUr9nOKmK39
